name: Brandeis University Mock Trials Association
description: The Brandeis University Mock Trial Association (BUMTA) is the official, student-run mock trial organization of Brandeis University in Waltham, MA.

name: Robotics Club
description: A club for those interested in building robots.

name: Education for Students by Students
description: The mission of ESS is to provide the platform FOR students BY students to develop and share your unique ideas through presentation and conversation.
